name: Tech Talk
description: Monthly talk on trending technologies in the tech industry

name: Hackathon
description: A 24-hour coding competition to build solutions for real-world problems

name: Workshop
description: Hands-on training on a specific technology or tool

name: Project Showcase
description: Opportunity to showcase personal or team projects built using Google's technologies

name: Study Jam
description: Group study sessions to prepare for Google's certification exams

name: Guest Speaker
description: Inviting experienced developers to speak on various topics in the tech industry

name: Code Lab
description: Hands-on coding sessions to learn new technologies and tools

name: Career Fair
description: Bringing tech companies to campus to meet and recruit potential hires

name: Tech Outreach
description: Organizing workshops and coding sessions for high school students to inspire them to pursue careers in tech

name: Community Service
description: Using technology to address social issues in the community

name: Google Cloud Bootcamp
description: Intensive training on Google Cloud technologies

name: Design Sprint
description: A 5-day process for ideation, prototyping, and testing solutions to real-world problems
